page.title: 05HOUSING IN S.E.LUTON
page.content:
{Class 6 of Wenlock School}carried out a survey of the houses in which they live.What they found is typical of Crawley Green,a mixed residential area of S.E.Luton.23 pupils were present.
{Bedrooms: } 1 person has 2 bedrooms 13 people have 3 bedrooms 2 people have 4 bedrooms 1 person has 5 bedrooms {Garages: } 16 people have garages {Sheds: } 13 people have sheds {Greenhouse:}1 person has a greenhouse {T.V.: } 23 people have televisions {W.M.: } 23 people have washing m'cs {Freezer: } 6 people have freezers {Dishwasher:}1 person has a dishwasher
